name: Hazardous Cleanup
description:
The Duke has moved in to the castle. He's pleasantly surprised by the contemporary furniture and choice in stone masonry. There is only one problem... There are traps, specifically spikes everywhere! The Duke has a plan to get rid of the spikes of course. Use the local villagers to render them harmless by getting stabbed on them instead of someone or something important.

Control a group of villagers through the castle's dungeons triggering all of the spikes that you can. Game was made for Ludum Dare 43 (Sacrifices must be made).

Controls:

A-D to move left and right.

Space to Jump or not at the bottom of the stack to split it.

W-S to add and remove villagers (if available)

Shift/Ctrl to switch which villager you control.
